snippet.title: Host 714 —  Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Play on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1579680/Host_714/

A drug user receives an offer that he cannot refuse that promises to change his life in a rehabilitation center on an island far from society. Arriving on the island, he realizes that it may not be what he expected. Help our protagonist to escape from the Orange Institute in this challenging stealth game.

Follow us on social media:
https://www.instagram.com/tengukazestudio
https://www.facebook.com/tengukazestudio
